1.title: Kingston: One Rev, One Love

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The Simmons clan gets introduced to Jamaica's capital city of "one love," Kingston.

2.title: Mexico City: They Are Eating Crickets

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Rev and the family head to the colorful sprawl of Mexico City where they sing with mariachi bands, take a Sunday cruise on the Xochimilco canals, and sample a local delicacy that's got Rev thinking twice about his tacos.

3.title: Tokyo: Getting Diggy with It

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Rev and the family meet up with his son Diggy in Tokyo for Diggy's birthday.

4.title: Bali: Hammock Hunters Int.

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Rev wishes to get centered by taking a trip to the "Island of the Gods."

5.title: Hong Kong: Please Don't Run

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Russy's wish for a custom suit turns the family's layover into an unplanned stayover. Faced with three days to explore, Rev gets the tailors to create an insider itinerary filled with Hong Kong ping pong, dim sum, and then some.

6.title: Chiang Mai: Elephant for X-mas

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Rev and the family arrive in the "land of smiles": Chiang Mai, Thailand. Home to over 300 temples, sweeping rice paddy fields, and beautiful mountain views, the city has Rev and the family quickly searching for their dream vacation home.

7.title: Dubai: Rev Goes to Extremes

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Rev can't wait to explore Dubai - a man-made oasis in the desert.

8.title: Istanbul: Run Bath or Bust

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Rev is eager to relax in a Turkish bath in Istanbul but finds himself in hot water instead.

9.title: Copenhagen: Rev's Great Dane Fairytale

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Rev's on a mission to win Father of the Year on the family's trip to Copenhagen. When Miley gets bored during their architecture tour, Rev decides to win back his daughter's attention by seeing the city through the eyes of a 7-year-old.

10.title: Rome: Pizza & Gelato Farfa Home

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Rev and the family say "Andiamo!" to Italy's capital city of food, fun, and romance: Rome.

11.title: Geneva: Cheese, Watch, Chocolate

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Rev and the family are excited to visit Switzerland - but for very different reasons. Rev sees it as a great place to detox in the fresh mountain air, but all Justine and the kids can think about is cheese and chocolate.

12.title: Amsterdam: Rev Wants to Chaperone

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: The Simmons head to The Netherlands for some family-friendly fun in Amsterdam, but Russy throws a wrench in Rev's plan when he decides to split from the family and go on a date instead.

13.title: London: Pinkies Up

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Rev and the family travel to London where they experience the city's royal treatment.

14.title: Reykjavik: Stranded on a Glacier

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Rev and the family wrap up Europe with a one-day stopover to the land of fire and ice.

15.title: Rio: Rev Run's Recall Redeemed

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Rev and the family are determined to warm up in Rio after their chilly trip in Iceland. The last time Rev was in Rio was more than 25 years ago, so Rev wants to immerse himself in the local culture.

16.title: Buenos Aires: Rev, Raw & Romantic

episode of.title: Rev Runs Around the World (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The Simmons clan travels to Buenos Aires, Argentina, the last stop on their worldwide adventure.

imdb.plot outline: Internationally acclaimed hip-hop artist and entrepreneur Joe "Rev Run" Simmons spent his younger days touring all over the world with powerhouse trio Run-DMC. He's seen it all, but now as a proud father, husband, and prominent family man, he wants his wife and kids to see it too. Leaving behind the comforts of New Jersey, Rev Run, Justine, Russy, and Miley Simmons are about to embark on the trip of a lifetime. An around-the-world one-way ticket over 5 continents and 16 countries will give the family a taste of what it's like to be immersed in foreign cultures, customs, and languages where everything is just a little (or a lot) different than back home. Rev and his family won't leave each location until they've experienced a place to its fullest. Yes, there will be bumps in the road and unexpected turbulence along the way, but at the end of the day, great times await and comedy will ensue on this epic global adventure.
imdb.title: Rev Runs Around the World
akas: Rev Runs Around the World (United States)
plot: Spanning over 16 countries, Rev Run is taking his family on a worldwide trip.

Internationally acclaimed hip-hop artist and entrepreneur Joe "Rev Run" Simmons spent his younger days touring all over the world with powerhouse trio Run-DMC. He's seen it all, but now as a proud father, husband, and prominent family man, he wants his wife and kids to see it too. Leaving behind the comforts of New Jersey, Rev Run, Justine, Russy, and Miley Simmons are about to embark on the trip of a lifetime. An around-the-world one-way ticket over 5 continents and 16 countries will give the family a taste of what it's like to be immersed in foreign cultures, customs, and languages where everything is just a little (or a lot) different than back home. Rev and his family won't leave each location until they've experienced a place to its fullest. Yes, there will be bumps in the road and unexpected turbulence along the way, but at the end of the day, great times await and comedy will ensue on this epic global adventure.::Departure Films
